greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of the sum of inverse products of parts in all partitions of n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..506
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0 or i=1, 1,
mathematica: a /@ Range[0, 30] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 29 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(s=0); forpart(p=n, s += 1/vecprod(Vec(p))); denominator(s);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 29 2020
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Dec 04 2018
